subject: Labor and Jobs
Belmont Stakes
Strikes
Horse Racing
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Racetrack workers at Belmont reached a labor deal with the New York Racing Association to head off a possible strike before a Triple Crown bid, the union and state officials said.
snippet: Racetrack workers at Belmont reached a labor deal with the New York Racing Association to head off a possible strike before a Triple Crown bid, the union and state officials said.
